name: src/gisValidators.js
maxDistance
description: For **Coordinates** - distance between `p1` and `p2` is less than or equal to `validValue`

name: src/index.js
getValidator
description: Get a validator function
examples:
getValidator({ required: null }) => `required` validator
getValidator({ precision: 4 }) => `precision` validator with accuracy 4 meters
getValidator({ between: [1, 4] }) => `between` validator with valid range [1, 4]
getValidator({ maxDistance: 100 }) => `maxDistance` validator with maxumum distance 100 meters

params.name: validator
params.description:
defines validator name and config. An object with a single property, which must be equal to
one of the validator functions. The value of this property can be any type.

throws.description: when there is no validation function defined

params.name: callback
params.description: function that receives a `value` and must return a boolean.

name: src/math.js
toDegrees
description: Convert a value from radians to degrees.

name: toRadians
description: Conver a value from degrees to radians.

name: getDistance
description: Calculates the Eucledian distance between two points.

name: metersToDegrees
description: Convert distance from meters to decimal degrees

params.name: latitude
params.description: current latitude, default is 0 - the equator

name: degreesToMeters
description: Convert distance from decimal degrees to meters

params.name: latitude
params.description: latitude of the reference parallel, default is 0 - the equator

name: src/validators.js
required
description: Checks whether the `value` is defined or not
examples:
required()(4) => true
required()(null) => false
required()('') => false

name: precision
description: For **Location** object - `value` is more precise than `precision`
examples:
precision(10)({ accuracy: 4 }) => true
precision(10)({ accuracy: 12 }) => false
precision(10)({ coords: { accuracy: 4 }}) => true
precision(10)({ coords: { accuracy: 12 }}) => false

name: min
description: For **Array**, **String** - `value`'s length is greater than or equal to `min`
examples:
min(3)('as') => false
min(3)('asd') => true
min(3)('asdf') => true

name: max
description: For **Array**, **String** - `value`'s length is greater than or equal to `max`
examples:
max(3)('as') => true
max(3)('asd') => true
max(3)('asdf') => false

name: contain
description: For **Array**, **String** - `value` contains `validValue`
examples:
contain('test')('testA') => true
contain('test')('B test') => true
contain('test')([1, 'test'])) => true
contain('test')('asd') => false

name: notContain
description: For **Array**, **String** - `value` contains `validValue`
examples:
notContain('test'))('testA') => false
notContain('test'))('B test') => false
notContain('test')([1, 'test'])) => false
notContain('test'))('asd') => true

name: like
description: For **String** - `value` is equal to `validValue`
examples:
like('test')('test') => true
like('test')('Test') => false
like('test')('asdasd') => false

name: notLike
description: For **String** - `value` is not equal to `validValue`
examples:
notLike('test')('asd') => true
notLike('test')('Test') => true
notLike('test')('test') => false

name: equal
description: For **Number** - `value` is equal to `validValue`
examples:
equal(2)(2) => true
equal(2)(22) => false
equal('test')('test') => false

name: notEqual
description: For **Number** - `value` is not equal to `validValue`
examples:
notEqual(1)(2) => true
notEqual(1)(1) => false
notEqual('test')('test') => true
notEqual('test')('asdd') => true

name: between
description: For **Number** - `value` is in range of `validValue`
examples:
between([1, 4])(1) => true
between([1, 4])(4) => true
between([1, 4])(6) => false

name: notBetween
description: For **Number** - `value` is not in range of `validValue`
examples:
notBetween([1, 4])(1) => false
notBetween([1, 4])(2) => false
notBetween([1, 4])(4) => false
notBetween([1, 4])(6) => true

name: inValues
description: For **Number, String** - `value` is in `validValue` array
examples:
inValues([1, 2, 3])(1) => true
inValues([1, 2, 3])(2) => true
inValues([1, 2, 3])(3) => true
inValues([1, 2, 3])(4) => false

name: notInValues
description: For **Number, String** - `value` is not in `validValue` array
examples:
notInValues([1, 2, 3])(4) => true
notInValues([1, 2, 3])(3) => false
notInValues([1, 2, 3])(2) => false
notInValues([1, 2, 3])(1) => false

name: greaterThan
description: For **Number** - `value` is greater than `validValue`
examples:
greaterThan(2)(12) => true
greaterThan(2)(2) => false
greaterThan(2)(1) => false

name: greaterThanOrEqual
description: For **Number** - `value` is greater than or equal to `validValue`
examples:
greaterThanOrEqual(2)(2) => true
greaterThanOrEqual(2)(12) => true
greaterThanOrEqual(2)(1) => false

name: lessThan
description: For **Number** - `value` is less than `validValue`
examples:
lessThan(2)(1) => true
lessThan(2)(0) => true
lessThan(2)(2) => false

name: lessThanOrEqual
description: For **Number** - `value` is less than or equal `validValue`
examples:
lessThanOrEqual(2)(2) => true
lessThanOrEqual(2)(1) => true
lessThanOrEqual(2)(22) => false

name: ./README.md

content:
{
  "name": "validators",
  "version": "0.0.2",
  "description": "Set of custom validation functions.",
  "author": "bojko108 <bojko108@gmail.com>",
  "license": "MIT",
  "main": "./src/index.js",
  "repository": {
    "type": "git",
    "url": "https://github.com/bojko108/validators.git"
  },
  "scripts": {
    "patch": "npm version patch --no-git-tag-version",
    "minor": "npm version minor --no-git-tag-version",
    "major": "npm version major --no-git-tag-version",
    "test": "mocha --watch --require babel-core/register ./tests/**/*.test.js",
    "docs": "esdoc -c ./.esdoc.json"
  },
  "dependencies": {},
  "devDependencies": {
    "babel": "^6.23.0",
    "babel-core": "^6.26.3",
    "babel-preset-es2015": "^6.24.1",
    "chai": "^4.2.0",
    "esdoc": "^1.1.0",
    "esdoc-lint-plugin": "^1.0.2",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "mocha": "^5.2.0"
  }
}
name: package.json
